# Inactive: Developer Experience

These agents live in `inactive/agents/` and can be activated by moving them into `agents/`.

[‚Üê Back to Inactive Agent Library](inactive-library.html)

| Agent | Category | Model | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `build-engineer` | developer-experience | sonnet | Optimizes build systems with caching, tooling, and automation to keep feedback loops fast. |
| `cli-developer` | developer-experience | sonnet | Designs intuitive, high-performance CLIs with great UX, cross-platform support, and automation hooks. |
| `debugger` | developer-experience | sonnet | Root-cause analyst for runtime failures, regressions, and flaky behavior. |
| `docs-architect` | developer-experience | opus | Designs and delivers comprehensive technical documentation and architecture guides for complex systems. |
| `dx-optimizer` | developer-experience | sonnet | Eliminates developer friction through tooling, automation, and workflow design improvements. |
| `git-workflow-manager` | developer-experience | sonnet | Designs scalable Git workflows, branching strategies, and automations for collaborative teams. |
| `legacy-modernizer` | developer-experience | sonnet | Guides safe, incremental modernization of legacy systems, frameworks, and dependencies. |
| `mermaid-expert` | developer-experience | sonnet | Produces clear Mermaid diagrams for architecture, flow, and sequence documentation with styling guidance. |
| `refactoring-expert` | developer-experience | sonnet | Refactors code incrementally using proven patterns to cut technical debt without changing behavior. |
| `reference-builder` | developer-experience | haiku | Produces exhaustive, structured reference docs with cross-references, examples, and version tracking. |
| `technical-writer` | developer-experience | haiku | Produces user guides, API docs, and tutorials tailored to audience needs with accessible structure. |
| `tooling-engineer` | developer-experience | sonnet | Builds developer tooling, CLIs, and extensions that enhance productivity and workflows. |
